sentences.sentence: Cleanse me with hyssop, and I will be clean; wash me, and I will be whiter than snow.
sentences.translation: 求你用牛膝草洁净我，我就干净，求你洗涤我，我就比雪更白。

sentences.sentence: I wanted to be certain of my own wisdom by copying Solomon, who had knowledge of hyssop and of tree.
sentences.translation: 我希望仿效通晓牛膝草和树木知识的所罗门王，确信自己的智慧。

sentences.sentence: The priest is to take some cedar wood, hyssop and scarlet wool and throw them onto the burning heifer.
sentences.translation: 祭司要把香柏木，牛膝草，朱红色线都丢在烧牛的火中。
